info.name: Quora - No Signup Popup
info.description: Allows you to browse Quora.com questions with no signup popup! Very small code utilized.
info.additionalInfo: Will only work in modern browsers with CSS3 support. Visiting the Quora homepage will STILL result in a login page, however, accessing the question directly (via google etc) will work flawlessly.

data.title: Doesn't work, you'll still hit the paywall
